#summary Keyboard shortcuts in JANUS

The following keyboard shortcuts are defined in JAUNS.

|| *View* || *Definition* || *Shortcut key(s)* || *Action* ||
|| Dashboard || Search || <Ctrl> + s || Opens the "Search" box and sets focus in the "Search" field ||
|| Dashboard || Create || <Ctrl> + c || Opens the "Create connection" box and sets focus in the "Enter new connection ID" field ||
